name.str_pl: issues of All About Swords

description: An interesting magazine that contains information about swords and sword fighting techniques from all across the world.

name.str_pl: issues of All About Swords

variants.description: An interesting magazine that contains information about swords and sword fighting techniques from all across the world.

name.str: Swordfighting, for Writers, Game Designers, and Martial Artists
name.str_pl: copies of Swordfighting, for Writers, Game Designers, and Martial Artists

variants.description: Answers for questions you may have if you've never held a sword in your hands.

name.str: The Beginner's Guide to the Long Sword
name.str_pl: copies of The Beginner's Guide to the Long Sword

variants.description: Based on different Europeans' martial arts, this book describes the main principles of swordsmanship.

name.str_pl: copies of Basics Of Stage Combat

variants.description: Foundation of using single handed sword on stage and on screen, with different tricks how to make a good show of it.

name.str_pl: copies of Medieval Combat in Colour

variants.description: An ancient fencing manual with updated illustrations of techniques.  Sometimes it just looks silly, describing how to fight if you have sword in one hand and a spear in another.

name.str_pl: collections of knife fighter's notes

description: It seems to be a guide to edged weapon combat, poorly photocopied and released on spiral-bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for beginners.

name.str_pl: collections of knife fighter's notes

variants.description: It seems to be a guide to edged weapon combat, poorly photocopied and released on spiral-bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for beginners.

name.str_pl: copies of The Medieval Dagger

variants.description: Principles and guides to Italian dagger combat, with useful drills and advice for novices.

name.str: Knife Fighting Techniques for the Street
name.str_pl: copies of Knife Fighting Techniques for the Street

variants.description: A small book that contain pretty simple and easy to follow movements to use against your enemy or enemies.

name.str_pl: copies of Knife Offense

variants.description: Complete methodology for using knives in a real fight, with tips and tricks.

name.str_pl: copies of Blade Combatives

variants.description: This book combines some different blade methodologies from European, Asian, and American martial arts into a unique style.

name.str_pl: copies of Knife Anatomy

variants.description: Lots of knife training methods and techniques for experienced martial artists.

name.str_pl: copies of USMC Sword Manual Procedures

description: A text on stationary sword drills in US Marine Corps.

name.str_pl: copies of USMC Sword Manual Procedure

variants.description: A text on stationary sword drills in US Marine Corps.  Contains lots of information about how to draw and pose with a sword, but nothing about using it.

name.str_pl: copies of Five Rings Illustrated

variants.description: An old Japanese treatise about swordsmanship, translated and polished, with additional illustrations and detailed explanations.

name.str_pl: copies of Records of the Medieval Sword

variants.description: Original research about straight two-edged knightly swords of the European middle ages.

name.str_pl: copies of The Unfettered Mind

variants.description: An ancient Japanese book of advice about building the proper skills and mind for sword fighting.  Talks too much about Zen, but the sword techniques are worth noting.

name.str_pl: copies of The Art of Longsword Fighting

variants.description: A grounded work about the history of swordsmanship, ways to teach it, and how to enhance students' experience.

name.str_pl: copies of Art of Sword Combat

variants.description: Translation of an old German treatise about using a few different cutting weapons in a real fight, with modern comments and clarification.
